تم إرسال هذا البريد الإلكتروني من خارج مجموعة شلهوب. لا تنقر على الروابط أو تفتح المرفقات إلا إذا كنت تعرف المرسل وتعلم أنه آمن


PUBLIC



Dear Arun,

 

Thanks for the email.

 

Please share the following:

*	Notice from Loccitane Riyadh Park advising the shortage of cargo
*	Photos of the pallet showing it is in open condition
*	Photos of the cargo where there is visible signs of shortage/pilferage

 

We look forward to hearing from you.

 

Kindly note that the above communication or requirements are not exhaustive. Issued on “without prejudice” basis.

 

Best Regards,

 

Vic Eldrin Munar

Non Motor Claims Manager (Property & Casualty)

Tel: (+971) 4 440 3759
